oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Battle of New Orleans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hyacinth Ladott's drawing of the Battle of New Orleans on Chalmette plain. Script at the bottom in French and English. British General Edward Pakenham mentioned. A copy of this drawing is in the TSLA Map Collection.
Fought several miles south of the city of New Orleans on January 8, 1815. The Americans inflicted huge casaulties on the British Army while suffering only minor losses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812;Louisiana--History--War of 1812
Campaigns & battles;Generals
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LaDott, Hyacinth
